ORIGAM Documentation : Passing Values

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified by Eva Čechurová on Jul 24, 2017

There are a number of methods how to pass values to workflow task parameters. You can pass data constants or values from context stores.

These are the current options:

  • Context Store Reference
  • Data Constant Reference
  • Data Structure Reference
  • Report Reference
  • Sequential Workflow Reference
  • System Function Call
  • Transformation Reference
